content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) for coal storage

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) for iron ore storage

### Copper Processing Complex at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) for copper ore extraction
- Complex inserter system:
  - Middle inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving items between chests
  - Input inserter at (22.5, 20.5) feeding furnace
  - Support inserters at (20.5, 22.5) and (22.5, 22.5)
- Storage system:
  - Input chest at (20.5, 21.5)
  - Middle chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing copper ore
  - Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing copper plates
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) for smelting
- Output inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving processed items to storage

### Unused Furnace Group
Two inactive furnaces at:
- (-11.0, 20.0)
- (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Belt Connections
- Cannot connect belts directly to wooden chests
- Use inserters instead of belts when moving items to/from chests
